verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to them \add that are\add* at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \add which are\add* \w named|strong="H5344"\w* \w chief|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, to whom the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*!\f + \fr 6.1 \ft are at…: or, are secure\f*\f + \fr 6.1 \ft chief: or, firstfruits\f*

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* ye unto \w Calneh|strong="H3641"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; and from thence \w go|strong="H3212"\w* ye to \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* the \w great|strong="H7227"\w*: then go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: \add be they\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than these \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*? or their \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w greater|strong="H7227"\w* than your \w border|strong="H1366"\w*?

Ye that put far \w away|strong="H5077"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and cause the \w seat|strong="H7675"\w* of \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* to come \w near|strong="H5066"\w*;\f + \fr 6.3 \ft seat: or, habitation\f*

That \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* upon \w beds|strong="H4296"\w* of \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w*, and \w stretch|strong="H5628"\w* themselves upon their \w couches|strong="H6210"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w* out of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and the \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w stall|strong="H4770"\w*;\f + \fr 6.4 \ft stretch…: or, abound with superfluities\f*

That \w chant|strong="H6527"\w* to the \w sound|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w viol|strong="H5035"\w*, \add and\add* \w invent|strong="H2803"\w* to themselves \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w musick|strong="H7892"\w*, like \w David|strong="H1732"\w*;\f + \fr 6.5 \ft chant: or, quaver\f*

That \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* in \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w*, and \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* themselves with the \w chief|strong="H7225"\w* \w ointments|strong="H8081"\w*: but they are not \w grieved|strong="H2470"\w* for the \w affliction|strong="H7667"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.\f + \fr 6.6 \ft wine…: or, in bowls of wine\f*\f + \fr 6.6 \ft affliction: Heb. breach\f*

¶ Therefore now shall they go \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* with the \w first|strong="H7218"\w* that go \w captive|strong="H1540"\w*, and the \w banquet|strong="H4797"\w* of them that \w stretched|strong="H5628"\w* themselves shall be \w removed|strong="H5493"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by \w himself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, I \w abhor|strong="H8374"\w* the \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* his \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*: therefore will I deliver \w up|strong="H5462"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with all that is \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*.  +  r 6.8  t that…: Heb. the fulness thereof *

And it shall come to pass, if there \w remain|strong="H3498"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And a \w man’s uncle|strong="H1730"\w* shall take him \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and he that \w burneth|strong="H5635"\w* him, to bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him that \add is\add* by the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add Is there\add* yet \add any\add* with thee? and he shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w No|strong="H0657"\w*. Then shall he \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Hold thy \w tongue|strong="H2013"\w*: for we may not make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 6.10 \ft we…: or, they will not, or, have not\f*

For, behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commandeth|strong="H6680"\w*, and he will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w breaches|strong="H7447"\w*, and the \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with \w clefts|strong="H1233"\w*.\f + \fr 6.11 \ft breaches: or, droppings\f*

¶ Shall \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* upon the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*? will \add one\add* \w plow|strong="H2790"\w* \add there\add* with \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*? for ye have \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* into \w gall|strong="H7219"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* into \w hemlock|strong="H3939"\w*:

Ye which \w rejoice|strong="H8056"\w* in a \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* of \w nought|strong="H3808"\w*, which \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Have we not \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* to us \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* by our own \w strength|strong="H2392"\w*?

But, behold, I will raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against you a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; and they shall \w afflict|strong="H3905"\w* you from the entering \w in|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hemath|strong="H2574"\w* unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H6160"\w*.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft river: or, valley\f*
